body.p: The inspiration for this project was the apparent demise of the SpringModules Project. SpringModules' Ehcache integration was used for a number of projects contributed to by the authors of Spring Ehcache annotations. When it was discovered that SpringModules no longer worked with version 3 of the Spring Framework, Spring Ehcache annotations was born.

The authors would like to give credit to the authors of SpringModules' Ehcache integration. The classes in com.googlecode.ehcache.annotations.utils and com.googlecode.ehcache.annotations.utils come directly from the SpringModules project with little or no modification.
The @Cacheable annotation and it's application is largely modeled after the @Transactional annotation in the Spring Framework.

section.name: Dependencies
section.p: Spring Ehcache annotations is a Maven project. The primary source for the list of dependencies can be found in the Dependencies report.
